body: I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I did my undergraduate work in Magical Economics at the Hogwarts School of Financial Wizardry. I've done research with....
